name: Oh, shit! Jam
description:
PLOT

You are a game developer, participating in a game jam.

You face problems during the development and you need to choose what is the RIGHT and what is the WRONG solution. 

Also you're trying not to die from bugs, procrastination, and the deadline. 

Do your best and make the game as good and polished as possible!

_________________________________________________________________________

Avoid or shoot the enemies

_________________________________________________________________________

Answer the QUIZ:

 If your answer is RIGHT, your movement or shooting speed will slightly increase

 If your answer is WRONG, your movement or shooting speed will decrease a lot

_________________________________________________________________________

CONTROLS:

 Hold LMB to SHOOT

 Press WASD to move any direction

 Press button (1) to answer YES

 Press button (2) to answer NO
